content: i figured for 6 5 balls each weighing roughly 50g the total equals 325g 6 5 x 50 = 325 5 multiply total weight by square inches per gram eg 325 x 2 45 = 796 25 square inches 6 take the square root of that number mine comes to 28 so i have enough for a 28 x 28 inch blanket 7 measure your gauge use gauge measurements to figure how many stitches to cast on eg my gauge was precisely 5 7 stitches per inch so 5 7 x 28 = 159 6 rounded up to160 stitches
